column7: Supervised individual study on advanced special problems in food science and human nutrition. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same or subsequent semesters. (Summer session: 1 to 4 graduate hours). Prerequisite: Written consent of instructor must be obtained prior to enrollment.
